content: **wrapped in jamie cal** started september 1st 2019 and comes in 3 seasons **season 1** consists of 12 squares from which you can make a blanket a shawl a scarf border option included **season 2** includes the big claire square and another 8 squares plus a second border option as a surprise veronika gadulová has joined the wrapped in jamie cal as a collaborator and has contributed an extra 4 squares plus a square border **season 3** gives you 3 different sized triangles and a third border option designed to fit the biggest layout option the *diamond kilt claire 20* which incorporates all designs patterns are released randomly the cal is free to join and patterns photo and video tutorials are provided for free on the black sheep crochet website in addition ad-free pattern pdfs area available for purchase each pattern includes the * extended pattern * photo tutorial * chart and legend * special stitches overview * pattern in a nutshell * image overlay crochet ioc terminology petranese explained basics document * introduction to wrapped in jamie updated for season 2 plus extra resources like visuals and links to all videos available in right- and left-handed versions and relevant tutorials **sizes** depending on the yarn and layout you choose you can make a small blanket from just a few squares up to the biggest option the large *diamond kilt claire 20* which uses each design 20 squares claire square triangles all info can be found on www blacksheepcrochet com support facebook group https //www facebook com/groups/363802097645087/ 1 for more information see https //blacksheepcrochet com/wrappedinjamiecal/ 2 1 https //www facebook com/groups/363802097645087/ 2 https //blacksheepcrochet com/wrappedinjamiecal/
